title: Many 1909 Obaks (T212-1) for sale including Gandil

posts.post_title: Many 1909 Obaks (T212-1) for sale including Gandil
posts.post_content:
Please follow the link below to see a large selection of 1909 Obaks for sale.  These are quite a bit tougher than their 1910 and 1911 bretheren.  All prices are delivered, please email me to reserve cards or with any questions, thanks!

[url]http://www.baseballcardresource.com/forsale/New/[/url]
